name: Bilge Gremlin
movement: 20 ft. walking, 10 ft. climbing, 20 ft. swimming
description: A tiny fey creature with a chaotic evil nature, known for its disruptive abilities.
memorable: Disrupts mechanical objects and can inflict sewer plague with its bite.
relations: Often found in filthy environments, thriving amidst disorder.
environment: Typically found in dirty water bodies or industrial areas.
strengths: Highly dexterous, able to evade attacks easily and disrupts nonmagical mechanisms within its vicinity.
weaknesses: Low physical strength and low hit points make it vulnerable in direct combat.
attacks: Bites and uses makeshift weapons for melee or ranged attacks, causing various damage types.
most_powerful_ability: Aura of Mechanical Mishap creates chaos among nonmagical mechanical devices within 20 feet.
skills: Proficient in perception, but limited by low Wisdom.
additional_information: Amphibious: Can breathe air and water.
Immune to disease, enhancing survival in filthy environments.
Creates malfunction in nonmagical mechanical devices within aura.
+3 Dexterity making it quick and difficult to hit.
Has a unique attack that can inflict sewer plague.

gremlin immune to diseases and chaotic
bilge gremlin with sewer plague bite
